meanings.sent1: The hot tea vapoured from the cup.
meanings.sent2: The factory vapoured smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The kettle vapoured like a little cloud maker.
meanings.sent4: The mist vapoured over the lake at dawn.
meanings.sent5: The steam vapoured up from the boiling pot.

meanings.sent1: He vapoured about his new car all day.
meanings.sent2: She vapoured about her achievements to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The peacock vapoured about its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The wind vapoured loudly about its strength.
meanings.sent5: The child vapoured about winning the race.

meanings.sent1: The magician vapoured in a puff of smoke.
meanings.sent2: The ghost vapoured into thin air.
meanings.sent3: The cookie vapoured from the jar mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: The dream vapoured upon waking up.
meanings.sent5: The snowman vapoured under the warm sun.
